sources.title: Crossroads (1942)
sources.description: An amnesiac French diplomat is blackmailed for crimes that he committed before he lost his memory.

metadata.Plot: Joshua and Cyrus were childhood best friends, bound by shared memories and youthful ambitions-Joshua aspired to be an engineer, while Cyrus dreamed of pursuing arts. However, life took them on separate paths, and years passed with...
metadata.Writer: Sean Dustin, Cheryl Añosa, Dane Klein Marquez
metadata.Actors: Julius Yoo-Han, Jerome Marcos, Prince Villamayor
